page.title: 20HISTORIC HOUSES IN THE AREA
page.content: In our area there are quite a few old houses including Bentley Manor and The Pleck. Bentley Manor is one hundred and twenty eight years old.It used to be a family home but it is now an Old People's Home.The ages of the people living in the house ranges from seventy-five to ninty years and at the moment sixteen old people are being looked after in the home. The Pleck which is also in our area,is only about eighty years old and has always been a family home.It has twenty five rooms including the old servants' rooms. In the grounds of The Pleck there used to be stables and a cottage which was called Jasmin cottage.The cottage was used for staff.The six acre grounds also include a lake which has forty Koi Carp living in it.
